017/**
018 *  <p>When multiple shipping addresses are set for a Line Item, use the Remove LineItem and Add LineItem update action to change the shipping details. Since it is not possible for the API to infer how the overall change in the Line Item quantity should be distributed over the sub-quantities, the <code>shippingDetails</code> field is kept in its current state to avoid data loss.</p>
019 *  <p>To change the Line Item quantity and shipping details together, use this update action in combination with the Set LineItemShippingDetails update action in a single Cart update command.</p>
020 *  <p>The LineItem price is set as described in LineItem Price selection.</p>
021 *
022 * <hr>
023 * Example to create an instance using the builder pattern
024 * <div class=code-example>
025 * <pre><code class='java'>
026 *     CartChangeLineItemQuantityAction cartChangeLineItemQuantityAction = CartChangeLineItemQuantityAction.builder()
027 *             .lineItemId("{lineItemId}")
028 *             .quantity(0.3)
029 *             .build()
030 * </code></pre>
031 * </div>
032 */
